channel.title: Need some computer help
channel.description:
hey everyone... havent been on in a while =/..
busy...
but im looking for some computer help..
right now im having two problems..
1) when i try to play anything with sound it get this error
[img]http://img485.imageshack.us/img485/237/adiool4.png[/img]
i plays windows sounds.. but nothing else
also it wont connect to the internet..
like when i plus in the LAN cable (right word?) it doesent connect.. not say anything
Any help?
Thanks in advance.

item.title: Need some computer help
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

[quote=“mvp566, post:2, topic:122616”]Ill look more into the sound

its a lan cable not usb…[/quote]
Ethernet cable* lel

Anyhow I had this problem a while ago with the sound i just reinstalled the drivers and it worked fine.

As for the ethernet cable problem I’m not really sure could you describe it a lil bit better?

Read full topic
